## Source: ossf-package-analysis (19b4660476331fc41f23ce20381efcebc7f8ba7c11954f491848bff463c7f0b0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'collaborator-trigger05' @ 1.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
